meanings.sent1: The wallpapered room looked cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent2: The walls of the bedroom were wallpapered with a floral pattern.
meanings.sent3: The wallpapered bathroom made me feel like I was in a garden.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a wallpapered room, filled with colorful memories.
meanings.sent5: The wallpapered hallway was a burst of color and design.

meanings.sent1: After the wallpapering, the room felt complete.
meanings.sent2: The wallpapered walls added a touch of elegance to the house.
meanings.sent3: I found an old wallpapered photo of my grandparents.
meanings.sent4: His words were like wallpapered memories, stuck in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The wallpapered book cover reminded me of childhood stories.
